mapper.select: SELECT ec.id,ec.title,ec.price,ec.lesson_num AS lessonNum,ec.img_url, ec.adimage, ec.buy_count AS buyCount,ec.view_count AS viewCount, ecd.description, et.id AS teacherId,et.name AS teacherName,et.intro,et.avatar, es1.id AS subjectLevelOneId,es1.title AS subjectLevelOne, es2.id AS subjectLevelTwoId,es2.title AS subjectLevelTwo FROM edu_course ec LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_course_description ecd ON ec.id=ecd.id LEFT OUTER JOIN red_class_user et ON ec.teacher_id=et.id LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_subject es1 ON ec.subject_parent_id=es1.id LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_subject es2 ON ec.subject_id=es2.id WHERE ec.id=#{courseId}

SELECT ec.id,ec.title,ec.price,ec.lesson_num AS lessonNum,ec.img_url, ec.adimage,ec.level, ec.buy_count AS buyCount,ec.view_count AS viewCount, et.id AS teacherId,et.name AS teacherName,et.intro,et.avatar FROM edu_course ec LEFT OUTER JOIN red_class_user et ON ec.teacher_id=et.id order by ec.id desc limit 8;
